type: Legendary Creature – Bird Performer Shapeshifter Noble
rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
[i]Prince of Serenes[/i] – Creature spells you cast with flying cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Galdr[/i] – {T}: Untap another target creature you control. If that creature dealt combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card. Activate only once each turn.
